== English ==
=== Announcement ===
We are invited for by the <nowiki>[[http://ieee.bytefreaks.net/|Institute of Electrical and Electronic Engineers]]</nowiki> of the <nowiki>[[http://www.ucy.ac.cy|University of Cyprus]]</nowiki> to give three presentations:

1) Introduction/history of Linux and FOSS (The long and boring one we
presented in the first Release party)
2) Academic/Scientific Applications (FOSS Alternatives to notable
Academic programs and Useful Applications for Students)
3) Shell Utilities and Pattern Matching (grep, sed, awk and friends)

Address:
Nicosia
Athalassa Avenue, Near the Military camps
Teaching Place 01 (xod 01) - Room 006
